com.koverse.sdk.sink.file

Class FileBasedSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koverse.sdk.sink.AbstractSink
      • com.koverse.sdk.sink.file.FileBasedSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OutputStreamOpener, Sink

    public abstract class FileBasedSink
extends AbstractSink
implements OutputStreamOpener
    A partial implementation of a sink that writes to files.
